headline.main: When All Else Fails, Embryo Donation Offers Hope

docs.abstract: After four years of infertility and many failures, this little baby popsicle of an embryo was our best hope at finally becoming parents.
docs.snippet: After four years of infertility and many failures, this little baby popsicle of an embryo was our best hope at finally becoming parents.

docs.lead_paragraph: A display showing mannequins of pregnant schoolgirls at a Caracas mall is shocking shoppers and stirring debate over sex education in Venezuela.
docs.snippet: A display showing mannequins of pregnant schoolgirls at a Caracas mall is shocking shoppers and stirring debate over sex education in Venezuela.

docs.lead_paragraph: Matthew Morrison says he's looking forward to trading in his choir director role on "Glee" for a return to Broadway and letting fans see him "in a different light."

headline.main: 'Glee' Star Matthew Morrison Excited for Broadway
headline.print_headline: 'Glee' Star Matthew Morrison Excited for Broadway

docs.snippet: Matthew Morrison says he's looking forward to trading in his choir director role on "Glee" for a return to Broadway and letting fans see him "in a different light."

headline.main: A Soon-to-Be Grandma, Ready to Learn

docs.abstract: This spring, my older daughter announced that she was pregnant. And I realized almost immediately that I knew nothing about today’s birthing or parenting issues. I had a lot of catching up to do.
docs.snippet: This spring, my older daughter announced that she was pregnant. And I realized almost immediately that I knew nothing about today’s birthing or parenting issues. I had a lot of catching up to do.

docs.lead_paragraph: The White House is planning to focus on improving the lives of girls and women of color, after months of complaints that they were left out of the "My Brother's Keeper" initiative for young men.

headline.main: White House Now Turning to Girls of Color
headline.print_headline: White House Now Turning to Girls of Color

docs.snippet: The White House is planning to focus on improving the lives of girls and women of color, after months of complaints that they were left out of the "My Brother's Keeper" initiative for young men.

docs.lead_paragraph: A New York woman has been sentenced to 20 years in prison for kidnapping a Pennsylvania woman and her infant after escaping police custody at a hospital while she was pregnant.

headline.main: Woman Sentenced for Kidnapping Mother, Infant
headline.print_headline: Woman Sentenced for Kidnapping Mother, Infant

docs.snippet: A New York woman has been sentenced to 20 years in prison for kidnapping a Pennsylvania woman and her infant after escaping police custody at a hospital while she was pregnant.

docs.lead_paragraph: Katha Pollitt, the columnist for "The Nation," the feminist essayist, poet and critic, has been frustrating some on the left and angering some on the right for years now.

headline.main: Katha Pollitt's New Book Takes on Abortion Debate
headline.print_headline: Katha Pollitt's New Book Takes on Abortion Debate

docs.lead_paragraph: At least 11 Indian women are dead and 20 others seriously ill Wednesday after undergoing free sterilization operations, highlighting the risks women face in reproductive health in a country struggling with high population growth and widespread poverty.

headline.main: At Least 11 Women Die After Sterilization in India
headline.print_headline: At Least 11 Women Die After Sterilization in India

docs.snippet: At least 11 Indian women are dead and 20 others seriously ill Wednesday after undergoing free sterilization operations, highlighting the risks women face in reproductive health in a country struggling with high population growth and widespread...

docs.abstract: As a new mother, newly laid off, it quickly became painfully clear that the life I’d imagined for myself once upon a time—as a professional, wife, and mother—had been a modern-day fairy tale.
docs.snippet: As a new mother, newly laid off, it quickly became painfully clear that the life I’d imagined for myself once upon a time—as a professional, wife, and mother—had been a modern-day fairy tale.

docs.lead_paragraph: As Republicans on Capitol Hill move from being the opposition party to being one that has to show it can govern, a powerful tension is emerging between its establishment and its activist wing.

headline.main: With Fear of Being Sidelined, Tea Party Sees the Republican Rise as New Threat
headline.print_headline: Before Battling Democrats, G.O.P. Is Fighting Itself

docs.abstract: Many conservatives from Republican Party's activist wing fear that congressional leaders are already being too timid with Pres Obama in wake of party's victories in midterm elections; powerful tension is emerging in party about how to move forward with agenda that challenges the president without self-destructing.
docs.snippet: As Republicans on Capitol Hill move from being the opposition party to being one that has to show it can govern, a powerful tension is emerging between its establishment and its activist wing.
